snippet: The Olympic champion Yuzuru Hanyu of Japan broke his own points record for a men’s short program to take a commanding lead of the Grand Prix Final in Barcelona, Spain.
abstract: Japanese figure skater Yuzuru Hanyu earns record 110.95 points in men's short program at Grand Prix Final in Barcelona.
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Yuzuru Hanyu of Japan broke his own points record for a men’s short program to take a commanding lead of the Grand Prix Final in Barcelona, Spain.
